reviewText: Gore or More is enjoyable.. just needs more gore, the stories are good just needs more gore.

First off, I highly advise this inexpensive (poor quality transfers however) collection of genre films. This is a fun dvd set and nicely packaged for quickie gift giving. I will leave the other posted reviews explain the rest of this item.
Secondly I want to comment on one movie. "Driller Killer" is one of the MOST unbearable horror films I have ever viewed. It is an interesting mix of film making, at points reminding me of the amateur quality of the Warhol/Morrissey films, but without good acting, did I say they had good acting? Well, at least the Warhol Factory people had charm.  When you mix  the punk/new wave scene of NYC in the 1980's with a psychotic drill killer, what can be the final result? I felt like someone had slipped something into my drink and I was not having a pleasant trip. I find worth in all films, but this movie is really a incoherent mess.

The bloodbaths in the GORE & MORE 10 MOVIE PACK are evenly divided between American and foreign made films. These are definitely 'B' grade, but that always seems to add to the appeal of this type of movie. These ten violence-laden obscurities are certain to satisfy all lovers of scream-and-croak cinema. For a bloody good time, check out CURSE OF THE DEAD 10 Movie Pack . . Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. (6.7) Bad Taste (New Zealand-1987) - Terry Potter/Peter Jackson (4.5) The Bloody Brood (Canada/USA-1959) - Jack Betts/Barbara Lord/Peter Falk (4.5) Don't Look In The Basement ("The Forgotten") (1973) - Bill McGhee/Jessie Lee Fulton (4.4) Driller Killer (1979) - Abel Ferrara/Carolyn Marz (1.7) Drive-In Massacre (1976) - Bruce Kimball/Adam Lawrence (2.2) Night Train To Terror (1985) - Barbara Wyler/Jamie Scoggin (5.3) The Pyx (Canada-1973) - Karen Black/Christopher Plummer/Donald Pilon (3.4) Scream Bloody Murder (1973) - Fred Holbert/Leigh Mitchell (4.7) Werewolf in A Girl's Dormitory ("Lycanthropus") (Italy/Austria-1962) - Barbara Lass/Carl Schell (4.7) The Werewolf vs. Vampire Women (Spain/W Ger-1971)

this set chock full of gore movies and if you like them you will love this set. now the transfers are a little worst here than in other sets so its up to you you can pay a little(5 to 10 dollars more)and get these in other sets with better transfers.
